summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of One Hundred Forty-nine and 41/100 ($149.41) Dollars, from the General Fund, or so much thereof as may be necessary, to pay the City's portion of the cost of the improvement of Twentieth Avenue South, from the north line of Plum Street, to Massachusetts Street, by constructing sewers, as provided for in Ordinance No. 16651, creating Local Improvement District No. 1540.
